mapper.select: select b.* from nf_busin b where b.rffsspid=#{rffsspid} order by lasttime desc
select b.* from nf_busin b left join nf_rffssp_user u on u.rffsspid=b.rffsspid where u.userid=#{userId} order by b.lasttime desc

select b.* from nf_busin b left join nf_rffssp r on r.id=b.rffsspid where b.status = 22 and b.id not in (select rffsspid from nf_busin where b.status != 22)
and r.storage_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{key}),'%')
and r.issueorg=#{orgCode}
order by b.lasttime desc

select r.apply_name as applyName, IFNULL(( select count(*) from nf_inbound_and_outbound o where o.type=0 and o.rffssp_id=r.id and date_format( o.operate_time, '%Y-%m') = #{date} ), 0) as ru, IFNULL(( select count(*) from nf_inbound_and_outbound o where o.type=1 and o.rffssp_id=r.id and date_format( o.operate_time, '%Y-%m') = #{date} ), 0) as chu from nf_rffssp r left join nf_busin b on b.rffsspid=r.id where b.status=22 and b.btype in (10,11,20,21) having (ru=0 or chu=0)
